HomePage.title: ERP nwere AI nke na-enye onyinye maka azụmahịa nwere ọgụgụ isi.
HomePage.description: Sonye na ndepụta echere maka ERP nwere AI nke na-enyere gị aka ịgba ọsọ azụmahịa gị nke ọma ma wulite ntụkwasị obi azụmahịa gị.
HomePage.queries: Maka ajụjụ ọ bụla, kpọtụrụ anyị
HomePage.name: Aha Gị
HomePage.information: Biko juo ozi niile e choro
